channel.title: The Adventures of Pockets
channel.description: An award-winning kids podcast full of fun and adventure! Travel the world with twins Sawyer and Suzie using their Grandpa's magical globe, explore the universe aboard the Space Train, fly with fairies, spend the summer with dinosaurs at Camp Dino, and so much more! The Purple Rocket produces exciting audio adventures the whole family can enjoy! Each season is a unique, originally written series, so find a season that sounds fun and dive in starting with episode one. Visit PurpleRocketPodcast.com to learn more.

item.title: Life Episode 30: Nester the Pestering Pumpkin
item.description:
Hugo loves pranks, which is why his favorite holiday is Halloween. This year he has the biggest prank ever planned for the occasion. But when his Jack-O-Lantern, Nester, comes alive, Hugo's plans change course.
Have a Helpful Halloween Rocketeers!
Visit Outschool.com/PurpleRocket and use code Purple Rocket to get $15 off your first class!

item.title: Life Episode 29: Chimpan-Chews Your Words Wisely
item.description:
Bethany struggles with her words. She's rude and has a tendency to say things in the worst possible way. But after getting lost in the jungle, finding magical bamboo, and transforming into a monkey, she learns just how powerful her words can be.
Visit Outschool.com/PurpleRocket and use code Purple Rocket to get $15 off your first class!

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 16: Payback
item.description:
This week on the season 2 finale of Space Train, Doug and the cadets board the purple rocket and bring their mission to a close.
Visit Outschool.com/PurpleRocket and use code Purple Rocket to get $15 off your first class!

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 15: Golden
item.description: Doug and the cadets battle The Rocketman and his fist bots.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 14: The Rocketman
item.description: Doug and Lydia come face to face with The Rocketman and learn of his intentions.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 13: Dark Side of the Moon
item.description: This week on Space Train, Doug and the cadets race to Earth to pick up the last group of prospective students.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 12: An Unnatural Disaster
item.description: Doug and the cadets answer a distress signal coming from the planet Fury. The largest storm of the century is coming and the Furians' pop-up shelters aren't working.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 12: Beyondra
item.description: Here it is Rocketeers, the season finale of The Adventures of Pockets. Pockets reaches Beyondra and looks for his real parents.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 11: The Rocketman's Lair
item.description: This week on Space Train, Doug and the cadets follow a tip to the Rocketman's Lair where they try to gather info.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 11: The Coronation
item.description: Petey and Pockets bring balance to Yondra.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 10: Wish Upon A Star
item.description: The cadets celebrate Doug's birthday aboard the space train.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 10: Heroes of Yondra
item.description: This week on Pockets, Pockets finds himself trapped between Tuga and the king as they battle it out for control over Yondra.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 9: The Exile
item.description: Doug and the cadets come face to face with the Doctor. Using a tip from their past enemy, they set out to stop the Rocketman as he tries to ambush a luxury space cruiser.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 9: Dungeon Delight
item.description: Pockets and Petey must find a way to escape the dungeon.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 8: It is Read
item.description: This week on Space Train, Doug and the cadets answer a distress call to pick up a boy named Etho who can read an entire book with the touch of a hand.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 8: The Pebble Castle
item.description: Pockets, Petey, and Cogline reach the Pebble Castle where they must get past the castle guards. Will they be able to overcome the trolls and shadow knights? Will they finally get an audience with the king? Find out in this week's episode!

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 7: Mind-Builder
item.description: Doug and the cadets visit the Academy where they perform a special mission using The Connector and Doug gets some extra attention for his mind-building skills.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 7: The Wizard of Bogsdeep
item.description: Pockets, Petey, and Cogline head into Bogsdeep where they visit a wizard who may be able to help them get through the castle gate.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 6: Gorf
item.description: Doug and his crew head to Gorf, where Blobby is reunited with his family.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 6: The Gizzard
item.description: Pockets and his friends meet Brak, an old Gizzard that has quite the story to tell.

item.title: Season 2 Episode 5: Brobot
item.description: As the cadets make their way back to the academy, Dallas receives a big piece of fan mail...a Brobot.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 5: Snail's Pace
item.description: Pockets' journey is slowed down by Slogger Snails.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 4: The Sound of Fusik
item.description: This week, Doug and the cadets head to Lyner X in search of a musical prodigy that will be the perfect addition to The Academy.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 4: The Sleeping Caves
item.description: Pockets and his friends head into the caves to hide from Tuga and his Gizzards.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 3: The Big Sniff
item.description: Doug and his crew of Wanderers head to the planet Schnauzheim where they must recruit a gifted boy named Broderick, also known as The Big Sniff.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 3: Big Bad Bock Bock
item.description: Pockets, Petey, and Cogline take a shortcut and end up confronting a giant chicken named Big Bad Bock Bock. Bock Bock will only let them pass if Pockets can defeat him in a Bock Off.

item.title: Life Episode 28: The Candy Gobbler: A Halloween Special
item.description: Here it is Rocketeers! The fully illustrated Halloween special! The Novel Effect Team and I have joined forces to bring you this interactive adventure. After listening to this episode, be sure to download the free Novel Effect App below and open The Candy Gobbler. As you read the ebook in-app you will see all the fun illustrations and the music/sound effects will automatically synchronize to your reading! It's amazing! Enjoy! And Happy Halloween! The Candy Gobbler: The last thing Kevin wants to do on Halloween is take his little sister Gracie trick-or-treating. So, he tries to spook Gracie with the tale of the Candy Gobbler, a mischievous candy bandit that goes around stealing kids' candy. But it isn't long before Kevin realizes that his story isn't just a story after all. Click here to download the free Novel Effect App: https://noveleffect.page.link/PsKZV8pRRYJTLYnH9

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 2: The Academy
item.description: This week on Space Train, the cadets tour the rebuilt Academy and Doug is asked to rebuild the Connector.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 2: Stuck in Cogtown
item.description: Pockets and Petey reach the land of Yondra where they learn of an urgent quest for the king and stumble upon Cogtown, a village in desperate need of help.

item.title: Space Train Season 2 Episode 1: Roll Call
item.description: Here it is, Rocketeers, the second season of Space Train! In this week's episode, Doug and the cadets go on an important mission to retrieve the records they will need to start the Academy of Wanderers.

item.title: The Adventures of Pockets Episode 1: The Giant Turtle Shell
item.description: The Purple Rocket Podcast Presents...The Adventures of Pockets! The only thing Pockets loves as much as his pocket-covered pajamas is an exciting adventure. Every morning he fills his pockets with trinkets in case they come in handy. But he couldn't imagine how handy they'd become until he's washed out to sea and finds himself on the shores of Yondra.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 17: The Gathering Hut
item.description: During their last evening at Camp Dino, Bo and the rest of the kids leave their mark on the Gathering Hut.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 16: Hear Us Roar
item.description: Bo and the rest of Camp Dino take on the Bakuza as they try to escape with their dinosaurs.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 15: Camp Bakuza
item.description: Bo and the rest of Camp Dino are taken prisoner and led to Camp Bakuza, where the kids make a huge discovery.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 14: The Tournament
item.description: Bo and the rest of the kids put their dinos to the test in the final tournament. Get comfortable, Rocketeers. This is the longest PRP episode to date!

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 13: Tuku's Stash
item.description: This week on Camp Dino, Bo is on a mission to track down Tuku in order to get their stuff back and find out more about the Bakuza.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 12: Bag of Secrets
item.description: Kirby and the kids arrive back at Camp and check in with Ma and Pa. Tensions are high after the latest events in the jungle, but Bo, Zada, and Gavin try to unwind with another visit to the Oasis.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 11: The Search
item.description: Bo, Zada, and Kirby venture into the jungle in search of Gavin.

item.title: Life Episode 27: A Girl Called Zebra
item.description:
For this week's episode of Life, I've teamed up with Brad and Betsy Peterson from BrighterFun.com to bring you a story about feelings. Recognizing and understanding our emotions helps us better empathize with those around us. Brad and Betsy have started a company that creates games and books that help kids and families share their feelings. They are offering our listeners a 30% discount when you use the promo code "feelings" at checkout. So visit BrighterFun.com to support their cause! Our family really enjoyed their Animal Chat Game and their new book, "Happy Puppy, Angry Tiger".
In this episode, a special girl from the planet Blander5 finds that her power to glow feelings is at odds with her people's strict code of not expressing emotion. But when she hears that there's a Feeling Crystal somewhere on the planet, she sets off on a quest that will ultimately help her better understand her superpower and its effect on those around her.
Huge thank you to Betsy Peterson from Brighter Fun for her awesome artwork!

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 10: Kirby on the Move
item.description: Bo struggles to track down Kirby in his quest for answers. Click here to listen:

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 9: Survival of the Thinnest
item.description: Bo tries to convince Zada to go looking for Gavin as they have their first class in The Cavern and endure another Wilderness Survival Class with Dr. Lovekin.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 8: The Watchtower
item.description: This week on Camp Dino, Bo and Zada practice training their dinosaurs and stumble upon more evidence of the mysterious Blue.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 7: Trade Off
item.description: Bo and Zada are pushed to their limits as they take their dinos through Dr. Bronson's treacherous obstacle course, The Course of Tears.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 6: Echo
item.description: It's relaxation day at Camp Dino! Bo, Gavin, and Zada get to go swimming at the Oasis and then head to their first meditation class with Dr. Sky. But 'relaxing' is the last word Bo would use to describe the day.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 5: Scoot, Toot, Shoot
item.description: Zada tries to figure out how to get a handle on her triplets as the kids go to their first class in The Arena.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 4: And Then There Were Three
item.description: Bo deals with the fallout from Buck's fight with the raptor and Zada finds out what kind of dinosaur she has!

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 3: Chute to Shanty
item.description: This week on Camp Dino, Bo continues to struggle with Buck as they take the Chute to their first Wilderness Survival Class at the Shanty.

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 2: Hatched
item.description: Bo spends his second day at camp searching for his hatched dinosaur.

item.title: Life Episode 26: A Merry Little Christmas featuring Mr. Eric of What If World
item.description: In a truly unique holiday special, Greg Webb and Mr. Eric from What If World team up to tell this fun tale of the Little Family. The Littles are a family of tiny people that live in a burrow under the Dawson's pine tree. Christmas is looking bleak this year as a snooty cat named Snowflake moves in and fog threatens to hide the town from Santa. Will the Littles be able to save Christmas? Find out in "A Merry Little Christmas". This story ties in directly to Mr. Eric's What Ifmas special on the What If World podcast, so be sure to head on over to What If World to hear what happens next to Snowflake. Click here to listen: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/what-if-world-stories-for-kids/id1164278826

item.title: CAMP DINO Episode 1: Welcome to Camp Dino
item.description: Bo is a homeschooler who's just getting over his obsessive dinosaur phase. But when his parents send him to a dinosaur summer camp in the middle of the jungle his world is turned upside down. At CAMP DINO you don't dig for fake fossils or sit through boring classes, you RAISE your own dinosaur from an egg. Join Bo and his friends on an unforgettable adventure into the world of dinosaurs!

item.title: Digger Episode 12: The Breakthrough
item.description: It's the Digger finale! In the final episode of the series, Dillon and his friends try to keep the Drum Rock key away from Kai as the war wages on between the Risers and the Surfacers.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 13: Timespinners
item.description: It's the season 2 finale of Grandpa's Globe! This week, Sawyer and Suzie team up with the other Globetrotters to confront Captain Drake and his Black Feather crew as they try to get to the Ice Dial in Antarctica.

item.title: Digger Episode 11: AREA 51
item.description: Dillon and his friends discover some surprises as they try to find a way out of Area 51.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 12: The Globetrotter Society
item.description: Sawyer and Suzie call to order the first meeting of the Globetrotter Society. But when they try to start planning out how to defeat the Black Feather, they hit a snag.

item.title: Digger Episode 10: The Knower Volcanoes
item.description: Dillon and his friends make it to the Knower Volcanoes. Will they finally meet the Knowers and find a way to the surface? Find out in Episode 10: The Knower Volcanoes!

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 11: Scotland and the Pipes of Thunder
item.description: Grandpa, the twins, and their new friend head to Scotland where they must find the last treasure Captain Drake is after.

item.title: Digger Episode 9: The Lower Ones
item.description: While Kai continues to prepare the Risers to surface, Dillon and the crew reach the volcano foothills.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 10: Saudi Arabia and the Lantern of Lost Souls
item.description: Donte and the twins head to Saudi Arabia to try and find the Lantern of Lost Souls before Captain Drake can get to it.

item.title: IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: The Purple Rocket is now on Patreon and other News
item.description: Exciting things are on the horizon for the Purple Rocket Podcast! Lend your support by visiting https://www.patreon.com/PurpleRocketPodcast

item.title: Digger Episode 8: Fishing for Answers
item.description: Dillon and his friends are boarded by the Union ship and find that their unexpected guest not only has answers to their questions, but can teach them how to Sky Fish.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 9: Argentina and the Treasure of Captain Drake Part II
item.description: Grandpa and Suzie try to figure out how to unfreeze Sawyer while Donte takes on the notorious Captain Drake. Will they make it off Captain Drake's ships? Find out in this week's episode of Grandpa's Globe!

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 8: Argentina and the Treasure of Captain Drake Part I
item.description: This week on Grandpa's Globe, Grandpa, Donte, and the twins head to Argentina where they board Captain Drake's pirate ships and try to find a way to stop him from getting away with the Globetrotters' magical artifacts. Will they succeed? Find out in Episode 8: Argentina and the Treasure of Captain Drake Part I

item.title: Life Episode 25: Lilly and the Bye Bye Bad Glove
item.description: We have a very special episode of Life for you this week. My daughter Aurora voiced the main character of this story and she did such an awesome job! She plays Lilly, a girl who's sick of dealing with all the challenges in her day. But when she finds a magical glove that allows her to snap past all the hard stuff, she learns why it's important to work through life's obstacles.

item.title: Digger Episode 7: The Mirage
item.description: With the airship repaired, Dillon and his friends reach land and must pass through the mysterious city of Mirage. There's only one problem - the only way they can see the city and its inhabitants is out of the corner of their eye.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 7: Zealous in New Zealand
item.description: Using their new magical artifacts, Grandpa and the twins explore the beautiful country of New Zealand and try to solve another mystery. Theme music by Kevin Macleod – Incompetech.com

item.title: Digger Episode 6: The Boiling Sea
item.description: Dive deep in this week's episode of Digger! Dillon and his friends venture into the Boiling Sea to hide from the pursuing Union Soldiers. Tension builds as they try to figure out how to fix the ship and get as far away from Rion as possible. Ominous music by Kevin Macleod - "Cyrpto", Action Music by 2BStudio - "Pirate Adventure"

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 6: Ukraine in the Membrane
item.description: Grandpa and the twins take his powerful new wheelchair for a test drive in Ukraine. Find out what cool gadgets they discover in this week's episode of Grandpa's Globe! Theme Song - Call to Adventure by Kevin MacleodParty Music - Dj Quads - SoulSpy Music by Catalin Marin (www.catalinmarin.com)

item.title: Life Episode 24: Pet Beans
item.description: This week on Life, a new invention has taken the little mountain town of Doogleheim by storm - Pet Beans! These miraculous little beans turn into real pets when thrown in water. Walter loves animals and has always wanted a pet, but things get a little out of hand when he dumps his whole box of Pet Beans into the water. Walter's about to learn what it means to be generous, kind, and honest. Theme song by Kevin Macleod. Other songs by the "Blue Dot Sessions" - "Silver Lanyard", "Entwined Oddity", and "Donnalee"

item.title: Digger Episode 5: Kai's Castle
item.description: Dillon and his friends are taken to Kai, the leader of the Risers where they learn about his plans to take over the surface and their role in it.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 5: Nigeria and the Brass Compass Part II
item.description: It's here Rocketeers - part two of Nigeria and the Brass Compass! Will Sawyer and Suzie find Gabriella and rescue her from the Black Feather? Find out in this week's episode! Music by Kevin Macleod.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 4: Nigeria and the Brass Compass Part I
item.description: Sawyer and Suzie follow the magical brass compass to Nigeria, where they start their search for Gabriella, a Globetrotter who has answers about the mysterious Globetrotter Society. But the twins’ mission gets complicated when they cross paths with The Black Feather. Theme music by Kevin Macleod – Incompetech.com. Songs by Kevin Macleod – “Call to Adventure”, “Sneaky Snitch” and “Dubakupado”

item.title: Digger Episode 4: The Garbage Lines
item.description: Dillon and his friends start their journey to the Outer Rim by braving the treacherous garbage lines.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 3: No Way Norway
item.description: This week, on our longest episode of Grandpa's Globe yet, Grandpa and the twins visit Norway. Grandpa is having back trouble again, so he decides to take the kids to a Norwegian spa. From there they explore a beautiful fjord and even help the Sami people rescue their herd of reindeer.

item.title: Digger Episode 3: Greeb's Hut
item.description: Mora brings Dillon and his friends into her home and introduces them to her father, Greeb, who tells the kids about their precarious situation in UnderEarth.

item.title: Digger Episode 2: The UnderEarth
item.description: Dillon and Mac drop down into the UnderEarth and quickly realize that this new place they've discovered is very different from home. They meet Mora, a girl who is unlike anyone they'd ever seen.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 2: The Christmas Mission (A Nativity Story)
item.description: Get in the holiday spirit with this week's Grandpa's Globe Christmas Special! Grandpa, Sawyer, and Suzie are whisked away on a very special mission to the North Pole on Christmas Eve. Santa has slept in and it's up to the three of them to deliver presents all over the world. ****Disclaimer**** This is a nativity story that covers the birth of Christ. Imagine “A Charlie Brown Christmas” Grandpa’s Globe Style.

item.title: Life Episode 23: Tony's Gobbly Good Thanksgiving
item.description: Life on the Culver family farm is shaken up with the arrival of a very snooty turkey named Tony. When Tony finds himself in a bind, he learns what it means to be truly grateful. Turns out - we're all lucky turkeys! Happy Thanksgiving everyone!

item.title: Digger Episode 1: Buried Treasure
item.description: Dillon and his mom have fallen on hard times. So when he hears a rumor about a past principal burying treasure under the baseball field at school, he decides to go searching for it. But when Dillon and his friend Mac start digging around, they soon find much more than a chest full of treasure - they discover an underground world.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Season 2 Episode 1: All Thai'd Up
item.description: Grandpa's Globe is back with our Season 2 premiere, "All Thai'd Up"! In this episode of Grandpa's Globe, Grandpa and the twins go on an exciting mission to Thailand where they must solve the mystery of the missing statues.

item.title: Life Episode 22: Winston's Book of Wizardry
item.description: If you are a Harry Potter fan, something tells me you'll enjoy this year's Halloween Special: Winston's Book of Wizardry. While Winston waited for his little sister to finish getting ready to go trick or treating, he did something he doesn't normally do - he cracked open a book. In a flash of light the book sucked him into it and sent him on an adventure through the magical world of Berry Cotter. Transformed into the hero of the story, Winston, or Berry Cotter as he's now known, must defeat Lord Walmort and save the students of Pigwarts. Winston's about to realize just how powerful reading really is! Big thank you to Kitty Felde of the Book Club for Kids Podcast and her friends for helping me tell this story! You can find Kitty's podcasts by visiting http://www.bookclubforkids.org and https://www.kittyfelde.com. Music - "Magical Glade" by Soul Candle and "The Alchemist Tower" by Brandon and Derek Fiechter

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 12: The Mystery Booth
item.description: We've reached the final episode of Winnie and the Pixienauts! Find out what the Pixienauts have planned for the future with Episode 12: The Mystery Booth. Fiddle Music - Rousseau's Dream Fiddle by Ricky Valadez.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 11: Fairygrounds
item.description: This week, Winnie and her crew face off against the Lunas in an epic battle at the fair. Will Winnie get the Orchid Queen back to her clan? Will they save the fairies before Rudy can turn them into a zoo exhibit? Find out in Episode 11: Fairygrounds.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 10: Pixienauts Unite!
item.description: Winnie, Jack, and Lou unite to rescue the Orchid Queen. But the mission doesn't exactly go according to plan and the Pixienauts find themselves in a dangerous situation.

item.title: Life Episode 21: The U.S.S. Boredom
item.description: Do you have a kid who's struggling with screen addiction? Check out this fun space adventure that's all about the consequences of too much screen time! Jade and the other orphans aboard the spaceship, the U.S.S.B, spend all their time staring at screens and playing video games. But after their ship is attacked they're forced to evacuate and land on a remote alien world. Now, Jade and her best friend must learn how to not only cope without their screens but survive. Big thanks to Rhea from the podcast, "Little Stories for Tiny People" for her help telling this story!

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 9: A Team Divided
item.description: Winnie gives Jack a piece of her mind for not showing up to the Luna mission, the group assembles at the Mystery Booth to decide what to do next and Winnie and Lou make a shocking discovery about their grandma.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 8: For the Queen
item.description: Winnie sets out to rescue the Orchid Queen and comes face to face with the bat-winged Lunas. But the mission goes south and Winnie is left with even more questions than before.

item.title: Life Episode 20: The Emperor of Empathy and the Journey Through Splash Pad City
item.description: Porter is having a hard time understanding the feelings of others. But that all changes when a giant bucket at the local splash pad dumps water on him and transports him to Splash Pad City. Join him on his journey through a land full of jumping geysers, waterslides and opportunities to show empathy.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 7: Feeding the Fire
item.description: Jack keeps his promise to Winnie and Winnie prepares for their mission by learning more about fairies from Oliver.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 6: The Pixienauts
item.description: Winnie, Jack and Oliver head back to the fair to recruit Dr. Theo Knight for their quest to save the orchid queen. But the fair's owner, Rudy, knows that Winnie disappeared near the carousel and has everyone looking for her. Will they be able to meet up and make plans or will they get caught? Find out in Episode 6: The Pixienauts.

item.title: Knights of Spatula Episode 6: Good Neighbors
item.description: Just when the Knights of Spatula think their situation couldn't get any worse, they discover that King Karl has hired a new crew of knights to protect his kingdom, the Knights of Ladle. As the competition heats up, the Knights of Spatula must prove that they are the only ones worthy of protecting Spatulot.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 5: The Deal
item.description: Winnie officially meets the fairy guard from the fair. She learns that his clan is in trouble and that they need her help rescuing their captured queen. Winnie tries to figure out a good way to break the news to her best friend Jack and recruit him for the mission.

item.title: Life Episode 19: My Homework Ate Me - A Cautionary Tale of Procrastination
item.description: Ben can't stand book reports, which is why when he's assigned one towards the end of the school year he plans on putting it off til the very last minute. He'd much rather be out in the dirt field by his house, finishing his clay maze masterpiece. But when Ben's book comes alive and starts nagging him about the looming deadline, he learns a valuable lesson about the perils of procrastination.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 4: The Souvenir
item.description: Winnie's first face to face encounter with a fairy goes horribly wrong.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 3: Them
item.description: Winnie goes to the county fair where she discovers a secret colony of fairies.

item.title: The Knights of Spatula Episode 5: Quest to Camp!
item.description: King Karl has sent the Knights of Spatula on a simple quest to guard his trees. But when the Knights camp out in the Furry Forest they quickly realize their task won't be so easy after all.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 2: Whispers in the Attic
item.description: Winnie and her best friend Jack play at their usual spot down by the river. But after being bitten by a venomous snake, Winnie's rushed home to Grandma Annie.

item.title: Life Episode 18: Pep the Peppermint Fairy
item.description: Santa has two groups of helpers at the North Pole, the Gruff Elves who build the toys and the Peppermint Fairies who make the treats for the stockings. Once their work is done, Santa takes their creations and makes his Christmas deliveries. But this year, one of the Peppermint Fairies finds himself in Santa's bag. When Santa becomes weary from the journey, it's up to little Pep to step in and use his magic to save Christmas.

item.title: Winnie and the Pixienauts Episode 1: The Orchid
item.description: Winnie introduces herself and describes the first time she'd heard about fairies.

item.title: The Knights of Spatula Episode 4: The King's Ball
item.description: Sir Splatterton and Abbey go to the ball together. But their lovely evening takes an unexpected turn when Prince Theodore, the prince Splat defeated in the jousting match, crashes the dance and seeks revenge.

item.title: Space Train Episode 21: From the Dust
item.description: The cadets salvage what they can from their battle with the Exiles and make plans for the future.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 21 Boone Vs The Dragon Part 2 - Globe Choppers
item.description: The twins and their grandparents jump from country to country in an attempt to destroy all of the Dragon's magical globes.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 20: Under the Willow Tree
item.description: Will and his family make an important discovery under their willow tree and set out to rebuild their kingdom.

item.title: The Knights of Spatula Episode 3: The Joust!
item.description: King Karl holds a special jousting match to determine what knight is worthy of taking his daughter, Princess Pepper, to the annual ball. Convinced this is his chance to woo the princess, Sir Splatterton enters the competition.

item.title: Space Train Episode 20: Fallen
item.description: To avoid becoming slaves to The Doctor and his academy, the cadets and their parents confront the Exiles in a battle for their future.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 20: Boone VS Dragon Part I
item.description: Decked out in their special samurai gear, the Boone family heads to The Dragon's headquarters to stop them for good.

item.title: Space Train Episode 19: The Black Sphere
item.description: Doug and the cadets flee the Academy of Exiles only to come across a giant black sphere that is sucking all light and warmth from the neighboring worlds.

item.title: Space Train Episode 18: The Academy of Exiles
item.description: The Space Train and its cadets are captured by the Exiles and taken to witness the construction of The Doctor's latest project, The Academy of Exiles. The deadline for the cadets to enroll has arrived and The Doctor plans to do everything in his power to make sure they join him.

item.title: Space Train Episode 17: Deadline
item.description: The cadets receive a distress signal from the planet Grom. Every day, a deadly laser line beams down from the sky and creeps towards the Gromlers’ capital city. If the Gromlers don’t gather enough precious minerals by the deadline the laser will reach the city. Doug and the cadets must find a way to stop the laser and find out who’s behind it. (Duration: 30:28). Theme music by Kevin Macleod – Incompetech.com.

item.title: Space Train Episode 16: Down the Hole
item.description: Doug and the cadets learn about black holes as they're faced with a very difficult decision - destroy the Norb so that The Doctor can't get his hands on it, or keep it so that they can use the extra power against him? Find out in this week's episode!

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 19: Battle of Emerald Creek
item.description: Will and his people defend themselves against Timothy Toad and his Dark Army in a battle over Emerald Creek.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 19: Japan and the Four Samurai
item.description: Grandma takes Grandpa and the twins to Japan where they must track down the armor of the Four Samurai in order to defeat The Dragon.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 18: Be Ye Warned
item.description: War is at the doorstep of the Daffodil Kingdom and Will finds himself in the fortunate position of being able to warn his clan of the imminent attack. But will they be ready to face the Dark?

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 18: Eleanor
item.description: This week we get to meet Grandma Boone! Grandpa and the twins hear all about Grandma Boone's adventures and find out where she's been.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 17: Storm Within
item.description: Timothy toad has captured Will and Magborne and plans to take them back to The Daffodil Kingdom. But on their way across The Black Sea a powerful storm rolls in.

item.title: Life Episode 17: The Tomato Smash
item.description: Millie Turner wants to spend every minute of summer with her friends and avoid her quirky family. But when it comes time for her favorite family tradition, a game of tomato baseball, she's torn between whether to go to a friend's tea party or play in the big game.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 17: Egypt and the Pharaoh's Treasure
item.description: Grandpa and the twins head to Egypt where they must stop The Dragon from stealing the treasure from Pharaoh Seti's tomb.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 16: Friends and Foes
item.description: Before fleeing the Temples of Light, Will and his family have a surprise encounter with someone from Emerald Creek.

item.title: Life Episode 16: The Bully Bus
item.description: Braden learns how to deal with bullies as he magically jumps into the shoes of someone who's experiencing it firsthand.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 16: Trouble in the South Pacific Part 2
item.description: Suzie and Sawyer finish their adventure in the South Pacific in this exciting part 2 climax to last week's story. If you haven't heard it yet, be sure to check out Part 1 of this story before listening.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 15: Trouble in the South Pacific Part 1
item.description: Suzie and Sawyer go on an adventure to the South Pacific where they must stop The Dragon from erupting the islands' volcanoes.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 15: The Temples of Light
item.description: Will and his family explore the Temples of Light and learn what happened to Magborne.

item.title: Space Train Episode 15: Doctor's Orders
item.description: Doug and the cadets finally meet the leader of the Exiles, a man who calls himself The Doctor.

item.title: Winglings Episode 14: Light at the End of the Tunnel
item.description: Will and his family make it to the Rainbow Ridge and it is full of surprises...both good and bad.

item.title: Life Episode 15: Lisa Learns to Listen
item.description: Lisa has big powerful ears that can hear things from far away. She dreams of using her special gift to become the next great superhero. But to become the great hero she was meant to be, she must first learn the importance of being a good listener.

item.title: Space Train Episode 14: Reflection of the Stars
item.description: The cadets follow the ships from Mudro to a hidden mirror planet that reflects the stars around it. There they meet copies of themselves as they try to figure out who was stealing soil from the Mudro people.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 13: The Pass
item.description: Will discovers a new power as he and his family journey through The Pass, a treacherous canyon full of Jumping Rocks.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 14: A Slice of Italy
item.description: Grandpa Boone takes the twins on a trip to Italy to give them a taste of real pizza. But will it be enough to impress Sawyer who can't stand pizza? Find out in this episode of Grandpa's Globe!

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 13: England - A Royal Adventure
item.description: Sawyer and Suzie must stop The Dragon from getting their hands on the royal crown and taking control of England.

item.title: The Knights of Spatula Episode 2: Rats!
item.description: Rodents have taken over Spatulot and it's up to you and the knights to stop them!

item.title: The Knights of Spatula Episode 1: Banditouies
item.description: The Knights of Spatula embark on their first adventure and they need your help! So grab your spatula and join the ranks as you participate in this interactive story!

item.title: Life Episode 14: Manners Manor
item.description: Jake's terrible manners are driving his family crazy! Desperate and running out of options, Jake's parents send him off to The Manners Manor, a hoity-toity school that teaches kids good manners. But Jake won't change his slobbish ways without a fight! Does the fancy school have what it takes to make Jake give up his bad habits? Find out in this episode of Life!

item.title: Life Episode 13: The Big Fat Fail
item.description: After Mikey and Amy fail big time on their school project, they're sent to The Land of Failures where they learn an important lesson about overcoming setbacks.

item.title: Space Train Episode 13: The Space Farmer
item.description: After the power goes out in the Cosmic Cafe, the cadets are forced to stop at the planet Mudro for supplies. There's just one problem, Mudro has no food...

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 12: Colorful India
item.description: Grandpa Boone's been having a rough day. So to cheer him up, Sawyer and Suzie take him on an exciting trip to India.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 12: The Pixienauts
item.description: Will and his family are introduced to their first Pixienaut - a man by the name of Theodore Knight who is the human ambassador to the fairies. During their first encounter, Will learns something new about himself.

item.title: Space Train Episode 12: Diva
item.description: The cadets are captured by Diva, an Exile obsessed with her own celebrity and one of Goro's former students.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 11: A G'Day in Australia
item.description: Sawyer and Suzie travel to Australia where they must stop The Dragon from collecting poisonous animals.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 11: The Dandelion Kingdom
item.description: Will and his family reach the Dandelion Kingdom and seek help from their most trusted allies only to find more trouble waiting for them.

item.title: Life Episode 11: Francine and the Frowny Brownies
item.description: For as long as she could remember, Francine and her entire town have always frowned. They can't help it. But as Francine takes it upon herself to solve the mystery, she discovers the contagious power of smiling.

item.title: Space Train Episode 11: Goro
item.description: Doug and the cadets learn about their robot conductor's past.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 10: Mexico
item.description: Grandpa and the twins go on a wild adventure through Mexico as they try to get the guidebook back.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 10 Pixie Fire
item.description: When The Dark reaches the Cacti Clan it's up to Will to save his family with a little help from his pixie power.

item.title: Life Episode 10: The Sorry Sisters Society
item.description: When Sofie moves to a new town she gets invited to be part of an exclusive group of friends that call themselves The Sorry Sisters Society. During her first day in the club, Sofie learns what it truly means to be sorry.

item.title: Space Train Episode 10: Brynthia's Secret
item.description: Doug and the cadets follow a distress signal to the mysterious planet Brynthia where they face their greatest obstacle yet.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 9: Switzerland and the Coo Coo Cocoa Man
item.description: Sawyer and Suzie go on a chocolate filled adventure through Switzerland!

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 9: The Deserts of Dread
item.description: Will ventures into the Deserts of Dread where he must find someone in the Cacti Clan who can help him restore his parents' memory.

item.title: Life Episode 9: The Christmas Candle
item.description: Holly Hannigan's mountain town of Frozen Falls becomes a winter wonderland during Christmas time. But things take a turn for the worse when a winter storm sweeps through on Christmas Eve and traps the Wagner family in their cabin. It's up to Holly to save Christmas.

item.title: BONUS EPISODE - Nicky: A Christmas Poem
item.description: Nicky spreads Christmas cheer throughout town with his little homemade wreaths.

item.title: Space Train Episode 9: The Academy of Wanderers
item.description: Doug and the cadets head to the Academy of Wanderers to retrieve important documents before the Exiles can get their hands on them.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 8: A Visit to Bethlehem
item.description: The globe sends the twins to Bethlehem to teach them the true meaning of Christmas.

item.title: Life Episode 12: The Booger Burglar - Don't Pick Your Nose!
item.description: Sick and tired of being picked all the time, Miles' nose takes matters into his own nostril by trapping Miles' finger and holding it hostage.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 8: The Bungabo
item.description: Will confronts the Bungabo in order to win the trust of the Daffodil Queen.

item.title: Life Episode 8: Augustus and the Great Friend Making Machine
item.description: Augustus, a seven year old genius, tries to short cut the friend-making process by creating a machine that makes friends for him. But it isn't long before Augustus' new invention goes haywire and he's forced to make real friends the old fashioned way.

item.title: Space Train Episode 8: Blub and the Bubblers
item.description: Doug and the Cadets make a stop at the planet Blub - a world full of bubbles! There they must find a way to help the Bubblers reconnect with each other and enjoy the amazing world they have.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 7: South Africa and the Hungry Hungry Hippos
item.description: Sawyer and Suzie experience South Africa as they set out to rescue their new friend's baby hippo from poachers.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 7: The Tulip Kingdom
item.description: Will and the group escape Kroe and stumble upon The Daffodil Kingdom.

item.title: Life Episode 7: Hal's Halloween
item.description: Every rat in New York City loves Halloween. Every rat except for little Hal Harrison that is. But this year is going to be different. The Harrison's are about to have a Halloween they'll never forget.

item.title: Space Train Episode 7: The Caboose
item.description: Doug and the cadets join forces to try to sneak into the forbidden caboose.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 6 Lost in Brazil
item.description: Grandpa treats Sawyer and Suzie to a fun vacation in Brazil. But the trip takes a turn for the worse when Suzie loses her new bracelet.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 6: Kroe
item.description: Will finally reaches Kroe where he'll try to find a cure to his poisonous Ink Eel bite.

item.title: Life Episode 6: Liz the Lazy Lizard
item.description: Liz is one lazy lizard. Unlike the rest of the land iguanas in the Galapagos Islands, who hunt for food and enjoy the beach, she prefers to sit around and do nothing. But as soon as a new predator threatens her colony, she's finally forced to get up and do something with herself.

item.title: Space Train Episode 6: JoJo MeJo and the Little Things
item.description: Doug and the cadets must save the planet Dobo from another Class Exile - JoJo MeJo! But doing so is proving to be no small task.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 5: Bring out the Wurst!
item.description: Sawyer and Suzie go on an exciting adventure through Germany where once again they find themselves taking on The Dragon.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 5: Fighting Waves
item.description: Magborne completes Will's training by teaching him how to use Pixie magic.

item.title: Life Episode 5: Pete's Eats
item.description: Josh has a bad habit of eating junk food. But thanks to a magical pizza buffet, he learns the hard way that you are what you eat.

item.title: Space Train Episode 5: The Orion Riders
item.description: Doug and the cadets finally get answers from Goro. But just as they start to take it all in, they're forced to compete in the Orion Pass Race.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 4: The Zaxlin
item.description: Will encounters new friends and foes as he begins his training with Magborne aboard the Jolly Leafer.

item.title: Life Episode 4: Honest Lee
item.description: Honest Lee is the most honest person in all the kingdom. But when he decides to finally tell one little lie to impress the princess things snowball out of control.

item.title: Space Train Episode 4: Comet Get'Em
item.description: Dallas is being held prisoner on a comet! His fellow cadets must come together and find a way to rescue him.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 3: Russia - Putin it all on the Line
item.description: A famous painting has been stolen from the Hermitage Museum in Russia and it's up to Sawyer and Suzie to get it back!

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 3: Stranger in the Jelly Tree Forest
item.description: Will and his baby sister brave the Jelly Tree Forest, desperately looking for someone who can lead them to the Temples of Light.

item.title: Life Episode 3: Gabby and the Gratidudes
item.description: Gabby, an aspiring rock star, learns the importance of expressing gratitude.

item.title: Space Train Episode 3: Mars and the Well of Being
item.description: Doug and the cadets embark on their first mission to Mars! There they must find a way to save the Martians' dwindling water supply from the Well of Being.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 2: Oh Canada!
item.description: Canada's pretty great, eh! Follow Sawyer and Suzie's incredible trip through Canada as they explore everything from French Quebec to Jasper National Park.

item.title: Life Episode 2: Same as Sam
item.description: Tyson Bagley has a once in a lifetime opportunity to be someone else for a day. But when he chooses to be the coolest kid in school things don't exactly go according to plan.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 2: Beyond the Fragrant Falls
item.description: Willam and his family are on the move! Follow their journey as they make their way through the mystical Fragrant Falls.

item.title: Space Train Episode 2: Gravity for Breakfast
item.description: Doug and the Cadets take their first trip to outer space and learn about gravity.

item.title: Winglings under the Willow Tree Episode 1: Remember the Rain
item.description: Ever wondered what everyday life is like for a fairy? Willam Wingling will tell you all about it in our first adventure of Winglings under the Willow Tree.

item.title: Life Episode 1: Dollar Billy
item.description: Can you imagine what it would be like if your parents were literally made of money? Billy knows exactly what that's like. Find out what happens when his wish finally comes true.

item.title: Space Train Episode 1: The Purple Rocket
item.description: Doug's building skills are put to the test when he and his classmates have a soda bottle rocket competition at school.

item.title: Grandpa's Globe Episode 1: Spain
item.description: Twins Sawyer and Suzie discover a magical globe in their grandpa's library that sends them on a wild adventure through Spain.
